text: The Stone Roses is the debut studio album by The Stone Roses. The album was released on July 23, 1989. ==Track listing== # "I Wanna Be Adored" – 4:52 # "She Bangs the Drums" – 3:42 # "Elephant Stone" – 3:01 # "Waterfall" – 4:37 # "Don't Stop" – 5:17 # "Bye Bye Badman" – 4:00 # "Elizabeth My Dear" – 0:59 # "(Song for My) Sugar Spun Sister" – 3:25 # "Made of Stone" – 4:10 # "Shoot You Down" – 4:10 # "This Is the One" – 4:58 # "I Am the Resurrection" – 8:12 # "Fools Gold" – 9:53 ==References== Category:1989 albums Category:The Stone Roses
title: The Stone Roses (album)
